CreateFacilitySetup.newFacilityStepTitle: Malo atsopano - gawo {step, number} la {total, number}
CreateLearnerAccountForm.header: Kodi mukulola wophunzira aliyense kukhazikitsa akaunti yake?
CreateLearnerAccountForm.noOptionLabel: Ayi. Adimini ayenera kukhazikitsa ma akaunti a anthu onse
DefaultLanguageForm.languageFormHeader: Sankhani chilankhulo chimene mukufuna kugwiritsa ntchito pa Kolibri
DeviceNameForm.deviceNameExplanation: Kupereka dzina lomveka bwino la chipangizochi kungathandize kuti inuyo komanso anthu ena omwe mukulumizikana nawo kuzindikira mosavuta
ErrorPage.errorPageAdditionalGuidance: Ngati mwayesanso koma sizikutheka, zimitsani ndi kuyatsanso seva yanu kenako mupange lifuleshi tsamba lino.
ErrorPage.errorPageSubheader: Pangani tcheki ngati seva yanu ili yolumikiza kenako muyesenso.
FacilityNameTextbox.facilityNameFieldMax: Dzina la Bungwe silingakhale ndi mawu oposa 50
FacilityPermissionsForm.facilityPermissi: Bungwe likutanthauza malo amene mungaike pulogalamu imeneyi pa kompyuta monga pa sukulu, malo ena ophunzirira kapena pa nyumba.
FacilityPermissionsForm.formalDescriptio: Ma sukulu komanso malo ena ophunirira ovomerezeka
FacilityPermissionsForm.learningEnvironm: Kodi malo anu ndi wotani pa nkhani ya maphunziro?
FacilityPermissionsForm.nonFormalDescrip: Za malo owerengera, malo osungira ana amasiye, malo othandizira anthu kusintha khalidwe, malo a achinyamata, malabotale a makompyuta komanso malo ena aliwonse.
GettingStartedForm.advancedSetupDescript: Zokhudza masukulu, mapulogalamu a maphunziro, mabungwe kapena magulu ena omwe azigwiritsa ntchito Kolibri pophunzira
GettingStartedForm.quickStartDescription: Pophunzirira kunyumba, maphunziro owonjezera komanso pa zina zomwe mwafuna
GettingStartedFormAlt.descriptionParagra: Mu Kolibri, mukhoza kuyendetsa zinthu zokhudza ma akaunti a gulu lalikulu la anthu, monga sukulu, pulogalamu ya maphunziro kapena gulu lina lililonse la maphunziro. Mukhozanso kukhala ndi malo ambirimbiri pachipangizo chimodzi.
GettingStartedFormAlt.gettingStartedHead: Kodi mukufuna kugwiritsa ntchito Kolibri motani?
GuestAccessForm.description: Izi zimathandiza kuti aliyense kuti awone zinthu pa Kolibri popanda kutsegula akaunti
GuestAccessForm.header: Kodi mukufuna kulola mlendo kuona zinthu pa akaunti?
GuestAccessForm.noOptionLabel: Ayi. Aliyense ayenera kukhala ndi akaunti kuti aone zinthu pa Kolibri
ImportIndividualUserForm.deviceLimitatio: ’{full_name} ({username})’ ndi {roles} pa ‘{device}’. Chipangizochi chili ndi zinthu zokhudza ophunzira okha. Zinthu zokhudza makochi ndi ma adimini palibepo.
ImportIndividualUserForm.doNotHaveUserCr: Kodi mulibe dzina lolowera ndi pasiwedi?
ImportIndividualUserForm.enterAdminCrede: Lembani dzina lolowera ndi pasiwedi ya adimini wa malo kapena supa adimini wa '{facility}'
ImportIndividualUserForm.enterCredential: Lembani dzina lolowera ndi pasiwedi ya akaunti yomwe mukufuna kulowetsa.
ImportLODUsersSetup.stepTitle: Lowetsani akaunti ya munthu - {step, number} pa {total, number}
LoadingPage.loadingPageSubheader: Chonde dikiranibe. Kuika kungatenge maminitsi ambiri
PersonalDataConsentForm.description: Ngati mukuika pulogalamu ya Kolibri yoti izigwiritsidwa ntchito ndi anthu ena, inuyo kapena munthu wina amene mwamusankha ndi amene ali ndi udindo woteteza komanso kukonza zinthu za pa ma akaunt kapena zokhudza ophunzira zimene zili pa chipangizo chino.
PersonalSetup.adminAccountCreationDescri: Akauntiyi imakupatsani mwayi woti muzitha kukonza ndi kuyendetsa zinthu pa matchanelo onse ndi maakaunti a anthu omwe ali pa chipangizochi
RequirePasswordForLearnersForm.header: Kodi mukufuna kuti ophunzira azitha kulowa pa akaunti pogwiritsa ntchito pasiwedi?
RequirePasswordForLearnersForm.noOptionL: Ayi. Ophunzira angathe kulowa pa akaunti yawo pogwiritsa ntchito dzina lolowera basi
RequirePasswordForLearnersForm.noOptionT: Zingathandize ophunzira achinyamata kapena amene sakudera nkhawa zoteteza akaunti yawo
SelectSuperAdminAccountForm.chooseAdminP: Sankhani adimini kuchokera mu '{facility}' kapena tsegulani akaunti ya supa admini yatsopano.
SelectSuperAdminAccountForm.createSuperA: Tsekulani akaunti yatsopano ya supa adimini
SelectSuperAdminAccountForm.description: Akauntiyi imathandizani kusintha zinthu zina m'malo anu a uthenga, zipangizo zophunzirira komanso ma akaunti a ophunzirira pa chipangizochi.
SetupMethod.descriptionImportLOD: Chipangizo chino chimachirikiza ntchito yogwirizanitsa zinthu ndi chipangizo china chomwenso chili chi pulogalamu yofananayi.
SetupMethod.descriptionParagraph1: Malo akutanthauza malo amene mungayike pulogalamu ya Kolibri, monga pa sukulu, malo ena ophunzirira kapena pa nyumba.
SetupMethod.fullDeviceTooltip: Chipangizo chonse chidzaikidwa pa seva ya Kolibri yogwiritsidwa ntchito ndi ma adimini, aphunzitsi ndiponso ophunzira
SetupMethod.importFacilityAction: Lowetsani data kuchokera ku pulogalamu yomwe ilipo kale
SetupMethod.importLOD: Lowetsani akaunti ya munthu m'modzi kapena angapo kuchokera ku pulogalamu yomwe ilipo kale
SetupMethod.initializeDevice: Sankhani mmene muchunire pulogalamuyi pa chipangizochi
SetupMethod.lodTooltip: Chipangizo chikhala ndi zinthu za Kolibri kuti zithandize ophunzira, koma osati aphunzitsi ndi ma adimini
SuperuserCredentialsForm.adminAccountCre: Akauntiyi imathandizani kusintha zinthu zina mmalo anu a uthenga, zipangizo zophunzirira komanso ma akaunti a ophunzira
SuperuserCredentialsForm.rememberThisAcc: Zikumbutso: Yesetsani kuti musaiwale zokhudza akaunti ino. Zilembeni kuti musaziiwale ngati pakufunika kutero
YesNoForm.details: Mukhoza kusintha zimenezi pa akaunti ya bungwe lanu nthawi ina
